history.empty: There is nothing to be shown here at this moment.

diagnosis.healthyText: Good News, you have nothing do worry about. Your plant is healthy.
diagnosis.footnote: The best result can be obtained by uploading the picture of a single leaf of the plant with a clear background. This application can only identify the healthyness of certain types of plants.

settings.aboutText: This application is a graduation project by Muhammed YÄ±lmaz. It uses a deep neural network model on the backend side to recognise the plant and the disease first, then it communicates with OpenAI's GPT api to get necessary information related to disease.
